import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from "react"; import "./faqs.css"; import { FiPlus } from "react-icons/fi"; export default function Faqs() { const [active, setActive] = useState(false); const contentRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { contentRef.current.style.maxHeight = active ? `${contentRef.current.scrollHeight}px` : "0px"; }, [contentRef, active]); const toggleAccordion = () => { setActive(!active); }; return ( <>
); }
